trans-unit.source: Retrieves sounds associated with a set of Windows operating system sound-event types.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os sons associados a um conjunto de tipos de eventos de som do sistema operacional Windows.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds> class provides methods for retrieving the sounds associated with a set of operating system sound-event types for the current user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds> classe fornece métodos para recuperar os sons associados com um conjunto de tipos de eventos de som de sistema operacional para o usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: The sounds associated with each type of operating system sound event can be configured in Windows Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: Sons associados a cada tipo de evento de som de sistema operacional podem ser configurados no painel de controle do Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds> provides static methods to access the sounds associated with the <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Exclamation%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Hand%2A> and <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Question%2A> sound events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds> fornece métodos estáticos para acessar os sons associados a <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Exclamation%2A>, <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Hand%2A> e <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Question%2A> eventos de som.

trans-unit.source: Each property returns a <xref:System.Media.SystemSound> that can be used to play the sound.
trans-unit.target: Cada propriedade retorna um <xref:System.Media.SystemSound> que pode ser usado para a reprodução do som.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sound associated with the <see langword="Asterisk" /> program event in the current Windows sound scheme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o som associado ao evento de programa <see langword="Asterisk" /> no esquema de som atual do Windows.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Media.SystemSound" /> associated with the <see langword="Asterisk" /> program event in the current Windows sound scheme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Media.SystemSound" /> associado ao evento de programa <see langword="Asterisk" /> no esquema de som atual do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Media.SystemSounds.Asterisk%2A> propriedade.
